titles.title: A bill to authorize certain employees of the Department of Agriculture charged with the enforcement of laws relating to the control or prevention of the introduction or dissemination of plant diseases or plant pests into the United States to carry firearms for self-protection.

bill.summary: 5/24/1988--Introduced. Authorizes certain Department of Agriculture employees charged with enforcing plant disease or plant pest prevention laws to carry firearms while on official duty.
